summary: Implements the requested 3-phase Valentine experience (fake 404 -> prompt with hearts + evasive No -> success with blue hearts) with a warm Tailwind theme, but the "No" button evasion appears incomplete for mobile tap/click prevention and there is extra unrequested footer/attribution content.

missing_requirements.requirement: The ‚ÄúNo‚Äù button must evade interaction on click/tap (mobile) so it cannot be successfully clicked.
missing_requirements.reason: The No button only moves on pointer hover/approach events (`onPointerEnter`, `onPointerMove`). There is no handler tied to pointer down / click / tap that guarantees evasion on mobile tap before selection, so it may still be tappable in normal mobile use.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer with external caffeine.ai attribution link and dynamic year.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in any REQ; adds an external link/attribution footer unrelated to the Valentine flow requirements.
REQ-4 only specifies showing the exact text ‚ÄúI Love you Karuvaya.‚Äù plus a blue heart effect; this additional message is not requested.
